item.title: Cracked Final Drive Spindle Alert
item.description: A critical find during inspection—a cracked final drive spindle that needs urgent repair to prevent major equipment failure.

media:content.media:description: A critical find during inspection—a cracked final drive spindle that needs urgent repair to prevent major equipment failure.

item.title: Franna Crane Project: Custom Engine Cover
item.description: See how a custom engine cover is designed and built for a Franna crane—combining function, durability, and a perfect fit.

item.title: Sir Meccanica Strikes Again: Line Boring Repair
item.description: Watch the Sir Meccanica in action as it tackles a precision line boring repair—restoring worn parts to factory specifications.

item.title: CAT D11 Dozer Ripper Shank Repair
item.description: Follow the heavy-duty repair process to restore a CAT D11 dozer’s ripper shank—bringing this powerhouse machine back to peak performance.

item.title: Machining a Massive Hydraulic Cylinder Nut
item.description: Watch the precision milling process that shapes a huge hydraulic cylinder nut—built to withstand extreme pressure and heavy-duty use.

item.title: A Guide to Repairing a Damaged Hydraulic Cylinder
item.description: A Guide to Repairing a Damaged Hydraulic Cylinder

item.title: Line Boring a CAT 789 Suspension Part
item.description: Watch the precision process of line boring and bore welding a CAT 789 suspension component—restoring strength to this heavy-duty mining machine.

item.title: Can This Be the Biggest Shaper?
item.description: Take a close look at the Klopp 1,000H—an industrial metal shaper with massive scale and precision. Explore its mechanics, capabilities, and place in heavy-duty machining history.

item.title: Making a New Hydraulic Cylinder Piston
item.description: From raw steel to a finished component—watch as a new hydraulic cylinder piston is precision-machined and built to withstand high-pressure performance in heavy equipment.

item.title: Thread Repair on 992G Wheel Loader
item.description: A damaged thread on a 992G wheel loader gets precision repair—machining, refitting, and expert tooling bring this massive component back to service-ready condition.

item.title: Rebuilding a CAT D10 Dozer Cylinder
item.description: Watch the detailed process as Cutting Edge Engineering Australia restores a CAT D10 dozer cylinder—precision repairs, expert welding, and heavy-duty machining at its best.

item.title: New Cylinder Barrel on Its Way!
item.description: The team preps and installs a fresh cylinder barrel for a CAT D10 dozer—precision machining and expert handling in full display.

item.title: Building the Custom Engine Cover!

item.title: Restoring a Big Excavator Arm and Bucket
item.description: Watch the full transformation as a worn excavator arm and bucket get restored—cutting, welding, and precision repairs bring this powerhouse attachment back to job-ready condition.

item.title: Servicing Our Lathe for the FIRST Time!
item.description: Servicing Our Lathe for the FIRST Time!

item.title: Shop-Built Heavy-Duty Tool Post Grinder
item.description: Cutting Edge Engineering builds a powerful tool post grinder from scratch—designed for precision, durability, and serious lathe work in a custom machine shop setup.

item.title: Transforming Metal into Machine Parts!
item.description: Watch as raw metal is shaped, cut, and refined into functional machine parts—highlighting craftsmanship, tools, and the process behind custom fabrication.

item.title: Making & Testing Heavy-Duty Tool Extension!
item.description: Watch as the team designs, fabricates, and puts a custom heavy-duty tool extension to the test—engineered for strength, precision, and serious shop performance.

item.title: We Made a Rotary Ground Clamp for Welding!
item.description: See how a custom rotary ground clamp is made from scratch—improving welding flexibility and current flow with a clever, hands-on fabrication solution.
